Unused code for the background of the game

// Tile of Scene
unsigned char TileScene[] =
{
  0x00,0x00,0x00,0xC0,0x00,0xC0,0x00,0xC0,
  0x00,0xC0,0x00,0xC0,0x00,0xC0,0x00,0x00
};

void Scene()
{
    // Load tiles
    set_bkg_data(0, 1, TileScene);
    set_bkg_tiles(0, 0, LabelWidth, LabelHeight, TileSceneMap);
}
